features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with email/password, Google OAuth, password recovery, and session management using Supabase Auth

features.name: Subscription and Payment System
features.description: Subscription management with Stripe integration, supporting credit card and PIX payments, trial periods, and subscription status management

features.name: Study Room with PDF Reader
features.description: Interactive study room with integrated PDF reader, text selection, annotation capabilities, and AI-powered assistance for studying

features.name: Flashcard System
features.description: Comprehensive flashcard system with spaced repetition algorithm, performance tracking, AI-generated cards, and community sharing

features.name: Quiz System
features.description: Quiz system with multiple-choice questions, timers, immediate feedback, personalized quiz generation based on user errors, and category-based analytics

features.name: Traffic Signs Library
features.description: Complete database of Brazilian traffic signs with categorization, search and filter capabilities, detailed descriptions and high-quality images

features.name: AI Chat Assistant
features.description: 24/7 AI-powered chat assistant for answering questions about traffic laws, explaining signs, and providing personalized study tips using Google Gemini

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive admin panel for user management, content management, subscription control, analytics, and system monitoring

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User profile with avatar upload, personal information editing, notification preferences, and subscription management

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Public-facing landing page with feature showcase, pricing information, testimonials, and call-to-action for new user registration

features.name: Notification System
features.description: Push and email notification system for study reminders, content updates, subscription alerts, and security notifications

features.name: PWA Support
features.description: Progressive Web App functionality with offline support, service worker caching, install prompts, and update management

features.name: Community Features
features.description: Social features including content sharing, user following, rating and commenting on shared flashcards, and gamification with points and rankings

features.name: Analytics and Reporting
features.description: User progress tracking, performance analytics, study time monitoring, category-based insights, and exportable reports
